I’m Guilherme Ferreira, UX/UI Designer, Consultant, Entrepreneur, Instructor and Creative, passionate about innovation and design, with over 17 years of international experience.

During this period, I had the honor of creating projects not only for 500 Fortune companies like Google, IBM, Mercedes Benz and AGCO, but also for promising startups like Indeed, CrewHu, Educate Net, Buildfire, Plannista, among others.

There were more than 200 companies around the world and millions of people were imp the experiences architected by our studio.
